biotools.summary: MS Annika is a crosslink search engine based on MS Amanda, aimed at identifying crosslinks of cleavable and non-cleavable crosslinkers from MS2 and MS3 spectra. It can deal with a wide variety of cross-linkers and provides robust and transparent FDR control based on a target-decoy approach. MS Annika is available free of charge as a plug-in for Proteome Discoverer.
